author: tvolkert
msg: Optimization: cache horizontal scroll bar height and vertical scroll bar width after layout() to increase the accuracy of our guesses in layoutHelper().  In some cases, this will save us an iteration inside layoutHelper(), which in turn saves us a call to view.getPreferred...().  In cases where the view has expensive logic in its preferred size calculations, this savings can be measurable.

author: tvolkert
msg: Added null pointer check in getText()

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add a String "text" property to TextArea.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Move preferred height calculations back into getPreferredHeight().
